greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(1-4*x)^(13/2).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = binomial(n+6, 6)*A000984(n+6)/A000984(6), where A000984 are the central binomial coefficients. - _Wolfdieter Lang_
Boas-Buck recurrence: a(n) = (26/n)*Sum_{k=0..n-1} 4^(n-k-1)*a(k), n >= 1, a(0) = 1. Proof from a(n) = A046521(n+6, 6). See a comment there. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Aug 10 2017
program: (MAGMA) [&*[2*n+i: i in [1..11 by 2]]*Binomial(2*n, n)/10395: n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
(Sage) [binomial(n+6,n)*binomial(2*n+12,n+6)/924 for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 20 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
